text: is a Japanese professional footballer who plays for Maltese club Naxxar Lions, as a midfielder. ==Career== Born in Osaka, Nagaoka has played for Hokuyo Senior High School, Londrina, Avaí, Carpenedolo, Maisons Alfort, North York Astros, Przebój Wolbrom, SK Blāzma, Tarxien Rainbows, AFA Olaine, Mosta, Qormi, Pembroke Athleta and Naxxar Lions. ==References== Category:1984 births Category:Living people Category:Japanese footballers Category:Japanese expatriate footballers Category:Londrina Esporte Clube players Category:Avaí FC players Category:A.C.
